text.0: hither that i may live i call unto the feast your wondrous car thoughtswift borne on by rapid steeds.
text.1: with thousand banners hundred treasures pouring gifts promptly obedient bestowing ample room.
text.2: even as it moveth near my hymn is lifted up and all the regions come together to sing praise.
text.3: i sweeten the oblations now the helpers come Ūrjānī hath o aśvins mounted on your car.
text.4: when striving man with man for glory they have met brisk measureless eager for victory in fight.
text.5: then verily your car is seen upon the slope when ye o aśvins bring some choice boon to the prince.
text.6: ye came to bhujyu while he struggled in the flood with flying birds selfyoked ye bore him to his sires.
text.7: ye went to the fardistant home o mighty ones and famed is your great aid to divodāsa given.
text.8: aśvins the car which you had yoked for glorious show your own two voices urged directed to its goal.
text.9: then she who came for friendship maid of noble birth elected you as husbands you to be her lords.
text.10: rebha ye saved from tyranny for atris sake ye quenched with cold the fiery pit that compassed him.
text.11: ye made the cow of Śayu stream refreshing milk and vandana was holpen to extended life.
text.12: doers of marvels skilful workers ye restored vandana like a car worn out with length of days.
text.13: from earth ye brought the sage to life in wondrous mode be your great deeds done here for him who honours you.
text.14: ye went to him who mourned in a far distant place him who was left forlorn by treachery of his sire.
text.15: rich with the light of heaven was then the help ye gave and marvellous your succour when ye stood by him.
text.16: to you in praise of sweetness sang the honeybee auśija calleth you in somas rapturous joy.
text.17: ye drew unto yourselves the spirit of dadhyac and then the horses head uttered his words to you.
text.18: a horse did ye provide for pedu excellent white o ye aśvins conqueror of combatants.
text.19: invincible in war by arrows seeking heaven worthy of fame like indra vanquisher of men.
